message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to offer it to you at a price of $12000. I believe this is a great value considering its worth to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. I would like to counteroffer at $10000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it brings to you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've considered your proposal and would like to counteroffer at $10000 for the product.

I understand you're sticking to your price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $11000. This is as low as I can go while still ensuring I make a reasonable profit.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to meet my price point. I would like to counteroffer at $10000 for the product.
